dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, uh, we gotta talk about this wild real estate story that's been making the rounds, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, uh, we gotta talk about this wild real estate story that's been making the rounds, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. This Beverly Hills mansion, you know, at 809 North Canon Drive. It's, like, a 5,400-square-foot place.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. This Beverly Hills mansion, you know, at eight hundred nine North Canon Drive. It's, like, a five thousand, four hundred-square-foot place.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The property at 809 North Canon Drive in Beverly Hills, California, in a satellite image from Google Earth. The 5,400-square-foot mansion was recently sold.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. And the buzz is, it was recently sold by, wait for it, President Trump.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. And the buzz is, it was recently sold by, wait for it, President Trump.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: She said one of her colleagues tried to sell Trumps house a few months ago.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and here's where it gets interesting, because the Washington Post then reports it was bought by a shell corporation, um, linked to a known opponent of his.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and here's where it gets interesting, because the Washington Post then reports it was bought by a shell corporation, um, linked to a known opponent of his.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tanoesoedibjo is an Indonesian business partner of Donald Trump, with his own ambitions for political office.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, immediately, people like Rachel Maddow are asking, "Why did someone just radically overpay the President for a property in L.A.?"
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, immediately, people like Rachel Maddow are asking, Why did someone just radically overpay the President for a property in L A?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: And Thursday night, MSNBC host Rachel Maddow ran a lengthy segment on the deal, asking: Why did someone just radically overpay the president for a property in Los Angeles?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And, honestly, Host_A, it really does seem like they did. The reported $13.5 million price? That's, like, wildly out of line.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, honestly, Host A, it really does seem like they did. The reported thirteen point five million dollar price? That's, like, wildly out of line.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The truth is, no one did. The reported $13.5 million price was squarely within the range of what could be expected for the house.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wildly. I mean, Forbes had it at $13 million, but that was part of a net worth assessment. But then, you talk to local brokers...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wildly. I mean, Forbes had it at thirteen million, but that was part of a net worth assessment. But then, you talk to local brokers...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In February, Forbes valued the property at $13 million as part of its twice-annual look at the size of Donald Trumps fortune.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah. Five local brokers estimated it at a *maximum* of $5 million. [laughs] Joe Babajian even called $13.5 million "outrageous."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah. Five local brokers estimated it at a maximum of five million. Joe Babajian even called thirteen point five million dollars outrageous.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: That estimate, just 4% off the reported sales price, was based on conversations with five local real estate brokers, who suggested the property could be worth anywhere from $11 million to $15 million. ... Even the broker who offered the lowest estimate, Joe Babajian of Rodeo Realty, said that $13.5 million was not an outrageous amount of money: Its definitely in the range.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Outrageous! And another broker, Mitra Sisatar, said her colleague couldn't even sell it a few months ago. Like, minimal showings.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Outrageous! And another broker, Mitra Sisatar, said her colleague couldn't even sell it a few months ago. Like, minimal showings.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: She said one of her colleagues tried to sell Trumps house a few months ago. He couldnt sell it, or he didnt have enough showings.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, it really does seem like an overpayment. Trump bought it for, what, $7 million back in 2007?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, it really does seem like an overpayment. Trump bought it for, what, seven million back in two thousand seven?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Yes, Trump bought the place for $7 million in 2007.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, $7 million. And L.A. County assesses it at $8.4 million today, which they say is already over its actual worth. So, he's, uh, looking at a pretty hefty gain.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, seven million. And L A County assesses it at eight point four million today, which they say is already over its actual worth. So, he's, uh, looking at a pretty hefty gain.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: And yes, Los Angeles County assesses it at $8.4 million today. But the market has changed over the last 12 years, and the true values of properties in Los Angeles County often diverge from their assessed values.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which, you know, the article sarcastically points out, makes it a "clear example of Trump getting richer off the presidency."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, you know, the article sarcastically points out, makes it a clear example of Trump getting richer off the presidency.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: So despite all the hype, the recent sale is not necessarily an example of Trump getting richer off the presidency.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [laughs] Right. And then, there's the whole ethics angle. His lawyer promised no new foreign deals, but then the article, you know, kinda winks and says this sale aligns perfectly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. And then, there's the whole ethics angle. His lawyer promised no new foreign deals, but then the article, you know, kinda winks and says this sale aligns perfectly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: If Tanoesoedibjo is in fact the buyer, the recent sale would seem to violate Trumps pledge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's just... it's a lot. And then, you have other brokers, like Ernie Carswell, saying, "Oh, it probably sold at a *slight discount* because of who the seller was."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's just... it's a lot. And then, you have other brokers, like Ernie Carswell, saying, Oh, it probably sold at a slight discount because of who the seller was.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Another local broker, Ernie Carswell, agreed: I believe it sold at the slight premium simply because of who the seller was.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A discount? Based on what everyone else is saying, that's just... [interrupts]
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A discount? Based on what everyone else is saying, that's just...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] Exactly! It's such a split narrative. Is it a suspicious overpayment, or just a really good deal for him?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! It's such a split narrative. Is it a suspicious overpayment, or just a really good deal for him?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I mean, the buyer is *rumored* to be an Indonesian business rival who's also, like, a "loyal customer." The whole thing is just, uh, a lot to unpack.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I mean, the buyer is rumored to be an Indonesian business rival who's also, like, a loyal customer. The whole thing is just, uh, a lot to unpack.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tanoesoedibjo is an Indonesian business partner of Donald Trump, with his own ambitions for political office.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. It definitely raises more questions than it answers, don't you think?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. It definitely raises more questions than it answers, don't you think?
